title: Print, "Ornamental Design from "Nouvelle suite de cahiers chinois a l'usage des dessinateurs et des peintres" No.3, Inventés et dessinés par Jean Pillement. Gravés par Anne Allen.", after 1775
medium: Etching with colored inks à la poupé on off-white laid paper
markings: Verso, blind stamp: Cooper Union Museum New York [Lugt 457e].
signed: In plate lower left in green ink: J. PIllement in.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right margin: 10.
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Fantasy three-level Chinoiserie bridge floating in empty space.  Chinois figure in pointed hat sits on steps in lower center, above him three bridges leading to arched doorways.  Architecture elements surrounded by foliage and trees.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Ornamental Design from "Nouvelle suite de cahiers chinois a l'usage des dessinateurs et des peintres" No.3, Inventés et dessinés par Jean Pillement. Gravés par Anne Allen.", after 1775.
after 1775. Etching with colored inks à la poupé on off-white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-41-26.
